text: An information hazard (or, infohazard, for short) is a piece of information that is harmful just to know about. For example, a nuclear bomb is a hazard. The method on how to create a bomb is an infohazard. Or, the information that putting your thumb wrapped around your other fingers and flicking the wrist down breaks the ligament. (Do not try this, it's painful). Category:Thought Category:Information
title: Information hazard
